title: Self-Rewarding Language Models
abstract: Demonstrates that large language models can iteratively critique and improve their own outputs without relying on expensive external reward models, unlocking cheaper autonomy loops.

title: DeepSeek-R1: Incentivizing Reasoning in LLMs
abstract: Presents a hybrid reinforcement and supervised training pipeline that coaxes multi-step reasoning via sparse reward shaping, hitting 90% on AIME 2024.

title: Voyager: An Open-Ended Embodied Agent in Minecraft
abstract: Introduces a lifelong learning agent that writes, executes, and improves programs in-game, continually expanding skills without reset.

title: Token Turing Machines
abstract: Explores theoretical limits of transformer expressivity by mapping them to differentiable Turing machines, clarifying how depth trades off with context length.
